text:
===========================
** Sprint 1 - Day 11 **
20/02/19
09:00-10:50

- Connect the weather API to our database. This API is only coming through every 30 mins. For this reason we will only pull the data every 30 mins.
- Sort out the burn-down chart
- Script for dynamic data and connect + pull to the database
- Lockdown the design for the website (Colours scheme, Build out the rest of the page)
